plot: A future where the only crime is life. 'Prey,' America's biggest reality show pits man against machine in the ultimate manhunt. ZB4Y, the last robot left, faces certain abortion unless he runs away...
title: Killswitch
plot_es: A future where the only crime is life. 'Prey,' America's biggest reality show pits man against machine in the ultimate manhunt. ZB4Y, the last robot left, faces certain abortion unless he runs away...
